Articles.Content:
Uhmm. No answer?

Press this button to get all the money you want, But you will be hated by everyone(EVEN YOUR FAMILY!)

No, I have a heart.

Press this to become rocket master! Note: You are hated by anyone who also uses spaceplanes.

EDIT: ninja'd.

No problem, all of my spaceplanes crash before they can even touch the runway. *Press*

Press this button or an equal and opposite button...but don't press both. Universe might implode, or something.

I'll take the equal and opposite button thank you very much.

Press this button to create another button with an identical effect in a random populated area.

Reproducing buttons? I don't think so.

Press this button to visit 1985 and then go back to the future.

Umm... can I travel to 2011?

Definitely not to kill the idiots that slaughtered Futurama.

Press ze button to have one of your KSP rockets in real life. You get to choose.

I'll push it, after all, they are only a few meters large.

Press the button to instantly create intelligent lifeforms at the same technological level as humanity on a random planet in the Milky Way galaxy.

No thanks, humans are already killing each other.

Press button for instant knowledge. For 30 seconds

*Press*

Press le button to have infinite monies.

However, every major city in the world gets nuked.

*Press*

Press le button to have infinite monies.

However, every major city in the world gets nuked.

I'm certainly not pressing that button.

Press the button to be transported to a dimension where you can build anything you want to at all, but there's no-one else to see it there.

If I can build anything I want, I can also build sentient robots for company and a portal to switch between dimensions as I please!

Press the button to experience your own birth by telepathically piggyback riding your mind back then - on the off-chance to experience it all from your mother's point of view.

Heck no, from what i hear its really painful, why would I do that?

Press the button for infinite, free macaroni and cheese, but nothing else?

Where's the catch? *Press*

Press the button for a pan-galactic gargleblaster - but you have to drink it all.

(Yes, I caught the Hitchhiker's reference in your signature justidutch)

Absolutely!!!

Press to button to become any Star Wars character you wish.... but your stuck in Revenge of the Sith... heeehehehe

I WANT TO BE R2D2 LOLOLOLOLOLOL

Press this button.

No.

Press ze button for free models of your Kerbal spaceships.

Yes.

Press the button for free cats.

No thank you.

A big red button labeled "DETONATE"

I push the button because what if balloons!??!!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!!?!!?!

press the button for difficult math questions.

Sure, why not?

Moments later....

"Damn, why did I press that button" - says the one who pressed the button while nervously scratching his head.

Press the button for snowball Earth all over again.

No, no snow at all

press the button for a newly colored button

[quote name='Penguinhero']No, no snow at all

press the button for a newly colored button[/QUOTE]
YES!
Press the button and it will say "EIGHT."

8/8 m8 sure m8

Press the button and the dankest of memes shall become real.

Nah

Press button and quadruple decker plane you will ride.

Nah.. too big

Press the button and you will become the kerbal doge. but much explode might happen.

Very much 50/50. SO explode. Much wow.
